quotes.message: Healing takes courage, and we all have courage, even if we have to dig a little to find it.
quotes.name: Tori Amos

quotes.message: Eventually you will come to understand that love heals everything, and love is all there is.
quotes.name: Gary Zukav

quotes.message: Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity.
quotes.name: Hippocrates

quotes.message: Healing does not mean going back to the way things were before, but rather allowing what is now to move us closer to God.
quotes.name: Ram Dass

quotes.message: Healing may not be so much about getting better, as about letting go of everything that isn't you - all of the expectations, all of the beliefs - and becoming who you are.
quotes.name: Rachel Naomi Remen

quotes.message: Healing yourself is connected with healing others.
quotes.name: Yoko Ono

quotes.message: Humor is healing.
quotes.name: Brad Garrett

quotes.message: The words of kindness are more healing to a drooping heart than balm or honey.
quotes.name: Sarah Fielding

quotes.message: I've experienced several different healing methodologies over the years - counseling, self-help seminars, and I've read a lot - but none of them will work unless you really want to heal.
quotes.name: Lindsay Wagner

quotes.message: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
quotes.name: Hubert Humphrey

quotes.message: Healing is simply attempting to do more of those things that bring joy and fewer of those things that bring pain.
quotes.name: O. Carl Simonton

quotes.message: Healing is impossible in loneliness; it is the opposite of loneliness. Conviviality is healing. To be healed we must come with all the other creatures to the feast of Creation.
quotes.name: Wendell Berry

quotes.message: The main reason for healing is love.
quotes.name: Paracelsus

quotes.message: Healing is embracing what is most feared; healing is opening what has been closed, softening what has hardened into obstruction, healing is learning to trust life.
quotes.name: Jeanne Achterberg

quotes.message: The greatest barrier to own own healing is not the pain, sorrow or violence inflicted upon us as children. Our greatest hindrance is our ongoing capacity to judge, to criticize, and to bring tremendous harm to ourselves. If we can harden our heart against ourselves and meet our most tender feelings with anger and condemnation, we simultaneously armor our heart against the possibility of gentleness, love and healing.
quotes.name: Wayne Muller

quotes.message: Healing requires from us to stop struggling, but to enjoy life more and endure it less.
quotes.name: Darina Stoyanova

quotes.message: Healing takes time. Despite great advances in medicine, the biggest part of your recovery is attributable to the enormous healing power inside you. The body heals itself according to its own timetable--anxious thoughts never hasten recuperation.
quotes.name: Criswell Freeman

quotes.message: Healing is the journey. The destination is yourself. The full recognition of all the different aspects of yourself-your joy, your sorrow, your pain, your pleasure-all lead you to the source of who you are. Only by having intimate contact with this source can you experience the fullness of your life. Only by fearlessly looking within can you embrace the landscape of your life and open yourself completely to all the love and compassion that lives inside you.
quotes.name: Philip Berk

quotes.message: Healing is the application of love.
quotes.name: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.message: It has been said that time heals all wounds. The truth is that time does not heal anything. It merely passes. it is what we do during the passing of time that helps or hinders the healing process.
quotes.name: Jay Marshall

quotes.message: By far the strongest poison to the human spirit is the inability to forgive oneself or another person. Forgiveness is no longer an option but a necessity for healing.
quotes.name: Caroline Myss

quotes.message: Healing doesn't mean the damage never existed. It means the damage no longer controls our lives.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Healing is an inside job.
quotes.name: Dr. B.J. Palmer

quotes.message: Before healing others, Heal yourself.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Emotional healing is almost always a process. It takes time. There is a very important reason for this. Our heavenly Father is not only wanting to free us from the pain of past wounds, he is also desirous of bringing us into maturity, both spiritually and emotionally. That takes time, because we need time to learn to make the right choices. He loves us enough to take the months and years necessary to not only heal our wounds, but also build our character. Without growth of character we will get wounded again.
quotes.name: Floyd McClung

quotes.message: Healing has to occur on three planes: Mental (thinking), Emotional (feeling) & Physical (outcome).
quotes.name: Rev. Reggie Howard

quotes.message: Any illness is a direct message to you that tells you how you have not been loving who you are, cherishing yourself in order to be who you are. This is the basis of all healing.
quotes.name: Barbara Brennan

quotes.message: Of one thing I am certain, the body is not the measure of healing, peace is the measure.
quotes.name: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.message: Love is the most important healing power there is.
quotes.name: Louise Hay

quotes.message: Healing is taking place all the time, and we know it is God who is doing the work.
quotes.name: Malinda Cramer

quotes.message: Healing begins in the moment a life-enhancing thought (an affirmation) is chosen to replace a life-diminishing thought, no matter how you may be feeling... no matter how much energy is moving or not moving in the body.
quotes.name: Binnie A. Dansby

quotes.message: Healing is about transforming the consciousness, creating a resonance within a person so that the healing can reach them.
quotes.name: HA-Tony Neate

quotes.message: A joyful heart is good for healing, a depressed spirit dries the bones.
quotes.name: PROVERBS

quotes.message: Healing proceeds from the depths to the heights.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: Healing begins with intention.
quotes.name: Dr. Jacqueline Fields

quotes.message: Healing is a choice. It's not an easy one, because it takes work to turn around your habits, but keep making the choice and shifts will happen.
quotes.name: Yehuda Berg

quotes.message: One of the most healing things you can do is recognize where in your life you are your own poison.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: One's attitude towards oneself is the single most important factor in healing and staying well.
quotes.name: Dr. Bernie Siegel

quotes.message: The practice of forgiveness is our most important contribution to the healing of the world.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: As soon as healing takes place, go out and heal somebody else.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Other people are going to find healing in your wounds. Your greatest life messages and your most effective ministry will come out of your deepest hurts.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: Healing invokes the power of compassion, both for yourself and for others... At this point, the healed may become a healer.
quotes.name: David Hawkins

quotes.message: Dancing, singing, storytelling and silence are the four universal healing salves.
quotes.name: Gabrielle Roth

quotes.message: Healing is a journey. It involves stepping out of our habitual roles, our conventional scripts, and improvising a dancing path.
quotes.name: Gabrielle Roth

quotes.message: With the gift of listening comes the gift of healing.
quotes.name: Catherine de Hueck Doherty

quotes.message: Healing happens when you sleep.
quotes.name: Mary Rabyor

quotes.message: The more you've suffered, the more you've wanted to bring healing to others.
quotes.name: Ralph Edwards

quotes.message: To experience some healing within yourself, and to contribute healing to the world, you are summoned to wade through the muck from time to time.
quotes.name: James Hollis

quotes.message: The body is a self-healing organism, so it's really about clearing things out of the way so the body can heal itself.
quotes.name: Barbara Brennan

quotes.message: In fact, if you look at the word 'healing' it comes from the word 'holy.' And healing is more than just physical phenomenon.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: We heal in a variety of ways: by accepting, believing, changing, connecting, coping, creating, forgiving, laughing, living, persisting, and transcending.
quotes.name: Jena Pincott

quotes.message: People go through challenging moments of losing people and of having their life threatened from illness and real grief. But they get through it. And that's the testament to the human spiritâ€” we are fragile, but we also are divine.
quotes.name: Sheryl Crow

quotes.message: The wish for healing has always been half of health.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: My faith really has played a huge role in healing. And I don't know how people deal with the loss of a loved one or a child without faith. It hasn't been easy.
quotes.name: John Ramsey

quotes.message: Deep unspeakable suffering may well be called a baptism, a regeneration, the initiation into a new state.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: The comfort of knowing you're not alone is in itself remarkably healing.
quotes.name: Jena Pincott

quotes.message: It is true that one can temporarily feel good by blaming one's misfortunes on others, but this always ends up causing greater pain and confusion. Accepting without blame is the true turning point of healing.
quotes.name: Tulk Thondup

quotes.message: Your medicine is in you, and you do not observe it. Your ailment is from yourself, and you do not register it.
quotes.name: Hazrat Ali

quotes.message: True medicine only arises from the creative knowledge of the last and deeper powers of the whole universe; only he who grasps the innermost nature of man can cure him in earnest.
quotes.name: Paracelsus

quotes.message: Healing without medicine is a good thing.
quotes.name: Madagascan Saying

quotes.message: An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.
quotes.name: Franklin

quotes.message: Healing comes only from that which leads the patient beyond himself and beyond his entanglements with ego.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: The cure for anything is saltwaterâ€” sweat, tears, or the sea.
quotes.name: Isak Dinesen

quotes.message: Much of the pain is self-chosen. It is the bitter potion by which the physician within you heals your sick self.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: Fortunately, analysis is not the only way to resolve inner conflicts. Life itself remains a very effective therapist.
quotes.name: Karen Horney

quotes.message: We doctors do nothing. We only help and encourage the doctor within...We are at best when we give the doctor who resides within each patient a chance to go to work.
quotes.name: Schweitzer

quotes.message: Love cures peopleâ€”both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
quotes.name: Karl Menninger
